name: Octaipipe ACE is deployed to a new customer
title: Octaipipe ACE is deployed to a new customer

testSteps.description: Given Acme has obtained a licence
When Como deploys Ace to Acme
Then Acme has the latest version of Ace installed

userStory.storyName: Commercial can deploy to customer sites

userStory.narrative:
The OctaiPipe platform (http://app.ace.octaipipe.ai) is used by the
commercial team to manage deployments on customer sites.
